title: Hextech Crafting Question
body:
I opened 2 Hextech Chests and both of them were Caterpillar Kog'Maw and Tribal Ryze
Both of them had the vintage icon next to it. What does this mean? Can someone please explain it to me?
Thanks! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Could you give us some more details? Was each chest two of the same skin? (Caterpillar Kog x 2 in one chest then Tribal Ryze x 2 in one chest) or was it both in both chests? (Caterpillar and Tribal in one chest x 2).

I remember seeing someone else that had something similar happen, I'll see what I can find out for you.
